problem_names: lemma PP[simp]: "\<And>t. t \<in> trm \<Longrightarrow> PP t \<in> fmla"
lemma Fvars_PP[simp]: "\<And>t. t \<in> trm \<Longrightarrow> Fvars (PP t) = FvarsT t"

lemma [simp]:
"n \<in> num \<Longrightarrow> subst (PP (Var yy)) n yy = PP n"
"n \<in> num \<Longrightarrow> subst (PP (Var xx)) n xx = PP n"

lemma HBL1_PP:
"\<phi> \<in> fmla \<Longrightarrow> Fvars \<phi> = {} \<Longrightarrow> prv \<phi> \<Longrightarrow> prv (PP \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>)"
translations: lemma PP[simp]: "\<And>t. t \<in> trm \<Longrightarrow> PP t \<in> fmla"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>t. t \<in> trm \<Longrightarrow> PP t \<in> fmla
unfolding PP_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>t. t \<in> trm \<Longrightarrow> subst P t xx \<in> fmla
by auto
lemma Fvars_PP[simp]: "\<And>t. t \<in> trm \<Longrightarrow> Fvars (PP t) = FvarsT t"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>t. t \<in> trm \<Longrightarrow> Fvars (PP t) = FvarsT t
unfolding PP_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>t. t \<in> trm \<Longrightarrow> Fvars (subst P t xx) = FvarsT t
by auto

lemma [simp]:
"n \<in> num \<Longrightarrow> subst (PP (Var yy)) n yy = PP n"
"n \<in> num \<Longrightarrow> subst (PP (Var xx)) n xx = PP n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (n \<in> num \<Longrightarrow> subst (PP (Var yy)) n yy = PP n) &&&
    (n \<in> num \<Longrightarrow> subst (PP (Var xx)) n xx = PP n)
unfolding PP_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (n \<in> num \<Longrightarrow>
     subst (subst P (Var yy) xx) n yy = subst P n xx) &&&
    (n \<in> num \<Longrightarrow>
     subst (subst P (Var xx) xx) n xx = subst P n xx)
by auto

lemma HBL1_PP:
"\<phi> \<in> fmla \<Longrightarrow> Fvars \<phi> = {} \<Longrightarrow> prv \<phi> \<Longrightarrow> prv (PP \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<phi> \<in> fmla; Fvars \<phi> = {}; prv \<phi>\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> prv (PP \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>)
using HBL1

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?\<phi> \<in> fmla; Fvars ?\<phi> = {}; prv ?\<phi>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> prv (subst P \<langle>?\<phi>\<rangle> xx)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<phi> \<in> fmla; Fvars \<phi> = {}; prv \<phi>\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> prv (PP \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>)
unfolding PP_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?\<phi> \<in> fmla; Fvars ?\<phi> = {}; prv ?\<phi>\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> prv (subst P \<langle>?\<phi>\<rangle> xx)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<phi> \<in> fmla; Fvars \<phi> = {}; prv \<phi>\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> prv (subst P \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle> xx)
by auto
end \<comment> \<open>context @{locale HBL1}\<close>
end
